special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I, II – Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Scry 1.
III – Until end of turn, target creature you control gains trample and gets +X/+X, where X is the number of lands you control.
​
